attributes.action: Legislation to ensure all employees in companies in the uk can have representation of their choice in formal company  procedures
attributes.additional_details: Legislation should be put into place to ensure that all companies should allow representations of an employees choice  in all grievance and Disciplinary procedures ... currently a company will allow a person to accompany an employee in the process but not give representation ... this can put an employee at a disadvantage if their company does not recognise a trade union ...
